column4: Would anyone mind helping me troubleshoot online video with firefox?  For example, all I see here is a grey box...http://www.break.com/index/amazing-choreographed-fight-scene.html
that's a flash movie.. you  need flash installed but it's broken at the moment (see topic)
Oh, ok.  Thank you.
you'll have to live without flash until they fix the flash package
has flash not been working for a while now?  This install is about 2 weeks old...
yes
I have version 8.0.99
well.. it's been in the topic for some time.. and it probably took a couple of days before they caught it
of flash?.. hang on
aye
try this page http://www.adobe.com/flashon/ .. see if that works for you
I see it
hmm. why don't that fighting video work then... odd
if you right click in that movie.. what version of flash do you have?
I can't figure it out for the life of me...
the /flashon movie?
Gnash? based on GameSWF? it says <unknown> 0.8.1
ag.. gnash.. that's still in alpha I think.. no wonder it works only sometimes
ahh...so wait for adobe to fix flash?
you'll have to switch that to adobe flash 9.0 to get the full experience of online ads and such =)
yes.. when they fix the flash ubuntu package
hehe...adblock+ takes care of all those ads.  :)  Thank you very much for your help.
you're welcome
